task.title: Starting a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: You can start a pipeline when it is valid. When you start a pipeline, the runs the pipeline until you stop the pipeline or shut down the .

context.p: pipelinesstartingFor a most origins, when you restart a pipeline, the starts the pipeline from where it last stopped by default. You can reset the origin to read all available data.
A Kafka Consumer origin starts processing data based on the offset passed from the Kafka ZooKeeper.

step.cmd: To start the pipeline, click the Start icon.
step.info: If the Start icon is not enabled, the pipeline is not valid or the is running a different pipeline.
